Text: Thanx mdusanjay. Love what you do here. Do you know anything about Crossed-Badlands no. 7 and 8?

Hey mdusanjay. Thanks for all your great work.  I just was wondering if you could post Warlord of Mars 13 or the current set thats out. I've been waiting to read past 12 until I could find it. I think you said somewhere that it was supposed to end on 18 or something like that. I hope they find a reason to extend it somehow. I really love this series. Stunning graphics and classic sci-fi story. I've never read the novels, so I dont know how it ends.
do a search. they are all there. mostly put up by mdusanjay himself. last one was 18 this month.
i will post the complete set by tomorrow..
mdusanjay. Thanks for all your hard work. I am looking for the dark tower comic set that comes before this, called The Way Station. any help would be greatly appreciated
Crossed-Badlands 7 & 8 are yet to be scanned..rest uploaded.
Thanks mate...been looking forward to this one!
Holy crap, thanks man! Love this series.
Anyone know where I can find the next one of these
seems like no one has #2 up yet. any help on where it could be found would be appreciated
